name: Asthma Diary for WordPress
body: ## Monitor your asthma Monitor your asthma Monitor your asthma symptoms by the mini-Wright Peak Flow Meter and other peak flow meters. ## A WordPress Plugin About The Asthma Diary is a plugin for WordPress developed by Per Thykjaer Jensen, MA â€“ lecturer at the Multimedia Communication and Design Programme at Aarhus Business College. Downloads Below you can download recent versions of the Asthma Diary and the dissertation on the development of it. ## Papers and prototypes * Astmadagbogen - et plugin til WordPress * The Asthma Blog - the CakePHP Prototype
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
